Description

  • Uses of JStachioExtensionProvider in io.jstach.opt.jmustache

    Classes in io.jstach.opt.jmustache that implement JStachioExtensionProvider
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    JMustacheRenderer
    Deprecated.
    This extension does not reliably mimic JStachio's mustache support unfortunately based on feedback we have decided to deprecate this and recommend using other mechanisms for hot reload.
